Package it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.peer

Class Summary
NeighborPeerDescriptor Class NeighborPeerDescriptor extends PeerDescriptor adding the reachability information about the known peers.
Peer The Peer is an abstract class that extends Node class.
PeerDescriptor Class PeerDescriptor maintains information about a peer to publicize its name, key, address and contact address to other peer.
PeerListManager Class PeerListManager extends Hashtable used to hold the peer descriptor of known peers.
